transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Good morning sir, IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu Kashish, kaise hai aap sab?
Customer: Ha ji badhiya hai.
Executive: Ah ji actually sir chair handle category hai na aapki, iski buylead consume nahi kari aapne kaafi time se, toh isi ke regarding maine call kiya aapko.
Customer: Koi relevant lead hi nahi aa rahi, relevant lead hi nahi aa rahi aur saari kuch jo bhi aa rahi hai, ek do piece ki retail wali aa rahi hai.
Executive: Toh ek kaam kariye na sir, jo ek not relevant ka option rehta hai na, aap usme mark kariye I do not need a low order value.
Customer: Wo sab karke dekh liya hai lekin wahi hai na system aapka AI se wo hai toh.
Executive: Nahi sir aap dekhiye na.
Customer: Aapne September mein mark kiya tha not interested buylead, theek hai? September mein aapko lead sahi aayi thi, then October mein aapne koi bhi lead mark nahi kiya waha par, aapne kisi bhi lead ka feedback nahi diya. Main aapko dikha sakti hu yaha pe, hume jo ek graph dikhta hai na, usme dikhta hai ki aapne kis mahine kis lead pe kya feedback diya, ki aapko retail ki lead aa rahi hai, aapko location ki lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Theek hai main abhi thoda wo busy tha us time toh ab Diwali ke time busy hi rehte hai, ab ab thoda free hue hai toh ab ab karenge.
Executive: Toh main kab tak call kar lu aapko, ek baar agar on call hi aap dekhe buylead sir, thoda main guide kar paau aapko buyleads ke liye aur agar aapko buylead nahi aa rahi hai na.
Customer: Guide ki zarurat nahi hai, main relevant lead abhi dekhunga main aaj baith ke. Guide ki zarurat nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi jaise ki maan lijiye chair handle category hai, iski leads aapko nahi dikh rahi hai buylead section mein, toh aapko ye karna hai sir ki lead manager mein jaana hai, aapki previous jo bhi aapne do teen buyer se baat ki hai, unhi buyer ko aapko reply karna hai and agar aapko waha se bhi karna hai aur ek past lead ka option rehta hai, past lead mein aapko I am interested mark karna hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Toh yahi do teen option hai, baaki uske alawa aapko jo direct calls aa rahi hai wo kaise aa rahi hai sir abhi?
Customer: Abhi thodi kam hai, thoda shayad market abhi thoda down hai is wajah se ho sakta hai kam ho.
Executive: Accha. Sir kyunki na direct calls bhi aapki na visibility pe depend hai aur visibility aapki depend hai ki aapki activity kitni hai IndiaMART mein, agar aapki activity kam hogi toh automatically visibility bhi kam hogi.
Customer: Are hamare matlab teen teen number de rakhe hai teeno pe kisi na kisi pe toh jaata hi hoga toh.
Executive: Aap calls toh answer hoti hai sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Calls toh proper answer ho rahi hai but agar same agar aapke jo buylead ka hai na, agar buylead consumption bhi aapki zyada rahegi na toh automatically call aur inquiry ka flow bhi zyada hi aayega sir. Sir aap ek kaam kijiye na, aapke paas toh IndiaMART login hai phone mein, theek hai?
Customer: Nahi main abhi office nahi pahucha hu, main abhi raaste mein hu, abhi ghar se nikal raha hu toh.
Executive: Accha. Main toh koi aur bhi employee hai kya jo.
Customer: Sir main ye soch rahi hu, koi aur bhi employee hai kya jo IndiaMART aapka dekh paaye, agar aap unke phone mein download kar de IndiaMART ka app toh.
Customer: Aur aur nahi hai, aur nahi hai.
Executive: Accha, jo sir.
Customer: Wo sirf phone pick karte hai baaki log, main main hi dekhta hu baaki cheeze.
Executive: Accounts dekhte hai wo sir?
Customer: Wo sirf calls calls ka unka number de rakha hai jaise inquiry wagera aati hai IndiaMART ki, toh unka number bhi de rakha hai secondary number.
Executive: Accha. Toh sir Deepak sir se boliye na ki wo bhi apne phone mein download kar le IndiaMART ka app.
Customer: Wo nahi kar payenge kyunki unko unko zyada busy aur rehte hai mere upar hi chhod rakha hai, wo main hi dekh lunga koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm. Chair handle ke alawa PU molded form category hai hamari sir, chair arm set category hai toh in category ki leads kaisi kya aa rahi hai abhi?
Customer: Main aapko 11:30 baje ek bari call karunga, main dekh ke bataunga kya aa rahi hai, ab pehle jo aa rahi thi wo bike aur two wheeler seat ki zyada aa rahi thi PU form mein. Toh usko bhi main kaafi wo delete maari irrelevantly declare kiya others mein jaake aur usme.
Executive: Others mein nahi karna hai sir aapko, aapko na.
Customer: We do not deal in in this category specification aapko wo option mark karne hai. Main abhi filhaal ek kaam karti hu, chair handle category ki kuch buylead aapko WhatsApp pe bhejti hu, aap ek baar open karke dekhna ki ye buylead kaam ki hai ki nahi aur jab aap IndiaMART login karoge na toh aap call kar lena mujhe ek baar.
Customer: Theek hai aap bhejiye.
Executive: Ji sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Retail leads of one or two pieces are coming.

- Direct calls are less due to market down.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested marking irrelevant leads.

- Executive explained how to mark leads as interested.

- Executive offered to send chair handle buyleads on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Customer will check leads and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, relevance, visibility
